info.name: PBXware_MT_Setup
info.description:
**PRECONDITIONs:**

1. Change value of Variable IP to IP of your system
2. Change value of variable API_Key to your API
3. You must have one Service Plan created manualy on your system.
    

Call screening edit and configuration ES on extension is removed because have bad response.

Phone Callback Edit and Configuration ES on extension is removed because it have problem.

BLFs Edit and Configuration ES on extension removed because we cant enable AP over the API, but only manual.

Extension Operation Times ES Configuration request was removed, because we don't have edit method to set first OT on extension, and then to call configuration method. When we call configuration method before manually saving it in GUI, it will return an undefined error.

query.description: Tenant Name (Required). Should be a valid FQDN (Fully Qualified Domain Name). (Regex: /^.+$/)
Tenant Package ID (Required). Can be obtained with package object. (Regex: /^\\d+$/)
Extensions length (Required). Can be in range 2-16 ONLY. (Regex: /^([2-9]|(1[0-6]))$/)
Country ID (Required).Can be obtained with route object. (Regex: /^\\d{1,10}$/)

Voicemail in CDRs
2: As Voicemail
1: As Not Answered calls
0: As Answered calls
(Regex: /^(1|0|2)$/)

FAX file type
1: Both PDF and TIFF
2: Only PDF
3: Only TIFF
Disable CallerID rewrite for tenant to tenant calls. (Regex: /^(1|0|2)$/)
Use Default CallerID for tenant to tenant calls. (Regex: /^(1|0|2)$/)
Use DIDs as CallerID for tenant to tenant calls. (Regex: /^(1|0|2)$/)
Convert recordings to mp3 on generation. (Regex: /^(yes|keep|no)$/)

Recordings format
-gsm: GSM
-wav: WAV
-wav49: WAV49
-g729: G729 native → GSM
-ogg: OGG

Currency writing convention
left: Symbol before amount
right: Symbol after amount.
(Regex: /^(left|right)$/)
Lock Extension After X Failed Attempts.  (Regex: /^\\d{1}$/)
Lock Phone After X Locked Extensions.  (Regex: /^\\d{1}$/)
Log Out After X Hours of Inactivity. (Regex: /^\\d{1}$/)

Do not allow users sending any CallerID. (Regex: /^(1|0|2)$/)

query.description: To add multiple IVRs use IVRs.csv file.
Tenant or Server ID (Required) If PBXware is running in Tenant Mode this is a required field and must contain a valid Tenant ID.ID 1 is always assigned to Master tenant and cannot be used.
IVR name. (Required). No spaces are allowed at the moment.
IVR Greeting (Required). All greetings must begin with greeting-.

Ringing Type
   ring: Generate Ringing
   moh: Music on Hold
   none: None
   Default is ring.
Music on Hold class. Applies only if ringtype is set to moh.
Number of loops before timoeut. Default is 3.
Local/Remote dialing   1: Enabled   0: Disabled   It is disabled by default.

Array of IVR keymaps (At least one keymap is required)
This argument is to be sent as keymap[key][field]=value
Supported keys:
   0-9
   \*
Supported fields:
   type: Destination Type
   destination: Destination (can be any valid extension)
Supported Destination Types:
   aa: IVR
   qu: Queue
   cf: Conference
   ex: Extension
   vm: Voicemail
   rg: Dial Groups and ERGs
Example:  keymap[\*][type]=aa&keymap[\*][destination]=103
